name: Reel Big Fish
description: '''Reel Big Fish''' is an American [[ska punk]] band from [[Huntington Beach, California]]. The band gained mainstream recognition in the mid-to-late 1990s during the [[Third wave ska|third wave of ska]] with the release of the gold-certified album ''[[Turn the Radio Off]]''. Soon after, the band lost mainstream recognition but gained an underground [[cult following]]. As of 2006, the band was no longer signed to a major record label and has since been independent. After numerous line-up changes, frontman Aaron Barrett is the last remaining founding member still performing in the band.
